tools.name: Create a new browser context
tools.description: Tool to create a new browser context. Use when you need to obtain upload credentials for a custom user-data-directory in a project.

projectId.description: The Project ID. Can be found in Settings.
projectId.title: Project Id

cipherAlgorithm.description: The cipher algorithm used to encrypt the user-data-directory.
cipherAlgorithm.title: Cipher Algorithm

initializationVectorSize.description: The initialization vector size used to encrypt the user-data-directory.
initializationVectorSize.title: Initialization Vector Size

publicKey.description: The public key to encrypt the user-data-directory.
publicKey.title: Public Key

uploadUrl.description: An upload URL to upload a custom user-data-directory.
uploadUrl.title: Upload Url

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Retrieve a browser context
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific browser context. Use when you have a context ID and need its metadata.

id.description: Unique identifier of the browser context to retrieve
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: ContextsGetRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for retrieving a browser context by its ID.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the context was created
createdAt.title: Created At

projectId.description: ID of the project linked to this context
projectId.title: Project Id

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the context was last updated
updatedAt.title: Updated At

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Update Browser Context
tools.description: Tool to update a specific browser context. Use when you need fresh upload URL and encryption details for an existing context, after obtaining a valid context ID.

id.description: The unique identifier of the browser context to update.
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: ContextsUpdateRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for updating a browser context.

cipherAlgorithm.description: Cipher algorithm used for encryption; currently only AES-256-CBC is supported.
cipherAlgorithm.title: Cipher Algorithm

initializationVectorSize.description: Size (in bytes) of the initialization vector for encryption.
initializationVectorSize.title: Initialization Vector Size

publicKey.description: Public key for encrypting the user-data-directory.
publicKey.title: Public Key

uploadUrl.description: Presigned URL to upload a custom user-data-directory.
uploadUrl.title: Upload Url

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Create Browser Session
tools.description: Tool to create a new browser session. Use when you need an isolated browser context before performing any page interactions.

contextId.description: Context ID for session persistence and reuse.
contextId.title: Context Id

extensionId.description: The ID of the custom extension to load.
extensionId.title: Extension Id

keepAlive.description: Whether to keep the session alive after disconnection.
keepAlive.title: Keep Alive

projectId.description: Project ID to associate with the browser session.
projectId.title: Project Id

proxies.description: Optional proxy configuration for the session.
proxies.title: ProxyConfig

userMetadata.description: Custom metadata object for the session.
userMetadata.title: User Metadata

connectUrl.description: WebSocket URL to connect to the session.
connectUrl.title: Connect Url

createdAt.description: ISO datetime when the session was created.
createdAt.title: Created At

id.description: Session ID of the created browser session.
id.title: Id

seleniumRemoteUrl.description: HTTP URL to connect to the session via Selenium.
seleniumRemoteUrl.title: Selenium Remote Url

signingKey.description: Signing key for connecting to the session.
signingKey.title: Signing Key

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Retrieve a browser session
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific browser session. Use when you have a session ID and need its metadata (status, URLs, timestamps).

id.description: Unique identifier of the browser session to retrieve
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: SessionsGetRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for retrieving a browser session by its ID.

connectUrl.description: WebSocket URL to connect to the session
connectUrl.title: Connect Url

contextId.description: ID of the linked context, if provided
contextId.title: Context Id

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was created
createdAt.title: Created At

endedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session ended, if available
endedAt.title: Ended At

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session expires
expiresAt.title: Expires At

keepAlive.description: Whether the session remains alive on disconnections
keepAlive.title: Keep Alive

projectId.description: The Project ID linked to the Session
projectId.title: Project Id

proxyBytes.description: Bytes used via the proxy during this session
proxyBytes.title: Proxy Bytes

region.description: Region in which the session runs
region.title: Region

seleniumRemoteUrl.description: HTTP URL to connect to the session via Selenium
seleniumRemoteUrl.title: Selenium Remote Url

signingKey.description: Signing key to use when connecting to the session via HTTP
signingKey.title: Signing Key

startedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was started
startedAt.title: Started At

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was last updated
updatedAt.title: Updated At

userMetadata.description: Arbitrary user metadata attached to the session, accepts simple JSON types
userMetadata.title: User Metadata

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Retrieve Session Debug URLs
tools.description: Tool to retrieve live debug URLs for a specific session. Use when you need to connect to a running session for debugging.

id.description: Unique identifier of the session to retrieve debug URLs for
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: SessionsGetDebugRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model to retrieve debug URLs for a specific session.

connectUrl.description: WebSocket URL to connect to the session
connectUrl.title: Connect Url

seleniumRemoteUrl.description: HTTP URL to connect to the session via Selenium
seleniumRemoteUrl.title: Selenium Remote Url

signingKey.description: Signing key used for HTTP connections to the session
signingKey.title: Signing Key

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Download Session Artifacts
tools.description: Tool to download files from a specific session. Use after session completion to retrieve all generated artifacts in a ZIP archive.

id.description: Unique identifier of the session to download artifacts from
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: SessionsGetDownloadsRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for downloading files from a specific session.

content_type.description: MIME type of the downloaded file, typically 'application/zip'
content_type.title: Content Type

file_bytes.description: Raw bytes of the ZIP archive containing session artifacts
file_bytes.title: File Bytes

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Retrieve Session Logs
tools.description: Tool to retrieve logs of a specific session. Use after actions in a session to inspect network events and data exchange.

id.description: Unique identifier of the session to retrieve logs for
id.title: Id

inputParameters.title: SessionsGetLogsRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for retrieving logs of a specific session.

items.description: A single log entry for a session network event.
items.title: SessionLogEntry

frameId.description: Frame identifier for the log event, if applicable
frameId.title: Frame Id

loaderId.description: Loader identifier for the log event, if applicable
loaderId.title: Loader Id

method.description: HTTP method of the network call
method.title: Method

pageId.description: Identifier of the page where the call occurred
pageId.title: Page Id

request.description: Request details of the network call
request.title: Request

params.description: Query parameters sent with the request
params.title: Params

rawBody.description: Raw body content of the request
rawBody.title: Raw Body

timestamp.description: Milliseconds elapsed since UNIX epoch for the request timestamp
timestamp.title: Timestamp

response.description: Response details of the network call
response.title: Response

rawBody.description: Raw body content of the response
rawBody.title: Raw Body

result.description: Parsed JSON result of the response
result.title: Result

timestamp.description: Milliseconds elapsed since UNIX epoch for the response timestamp
timestamp.title: Timestamp

sessionId.description: Session identifier for this log entry
sessionId.title: Session Id

timestamp.description: Milliseconds elapsed since UNIX epoch for this log entry
timestamp.title: Timestamp

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: List Browser Sessions
tools.description: Tool to list all browser sessions. Use when you need to retrieve sessions with optional filtering by status or metadata query.

q.description: Query sessions by user metadata using a JSON string filter.
q.title: Q

status.description: Filter sessions by status. Available options: RUNNING, ERROR, TIMED_OUT, COMPLETED.
status.title: Status

inputParameters.title: SessionsListRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for listing browser sessions with optional filters.

items.description: Summary of a browser session returned in list operations.
items.title: SessionSummary

contextId.description: Context ID linked to the session, if provided
contextId.title: Context Id

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was created
createdAt.title: Created At

endedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session ended, if available
endedAt.title: Ended At

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session expires
expiresAt.title: Expires At

keepAlive.description: Indicates if the session remains alive on disconnections
keepAlive.title: Keep Alive

projectId.description: Project ID linked to the session
projectId.title: Project Id

proxyBytes.description: Bytes used via proxy during this session
proxyBytes.title: Proxy Bytes

startedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was started
startedAt.title: Started At

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was last updated
updatedAt.title: Updated At

userMetadata.description: Arbitrary user metadata attached to the session, accepts simple JSON types
userMetadata.title: User Metadata

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful

tools.name: Update Browser Session
tools.description: Tool to update the status of a specific browser session. Use when you need to request session completion before timeout to avoid additional charges.

id.description: Unique identifier of the browser session to update
id.title: Id

projectId.description: The Project ID linked to the session
projectId.title: Project Id

status.description: Set to REQUEST_RELEASE to request that the session complete before its timeout
status.title: Status

inputParameters.title: SessionsUpdateRequest
inputParameters.description: Request model for updating a browser session's status.

contextId.description: Context ID linked to the session, if provided
contextId.title: Context Id

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was created
createdAt.title: Created At

endedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session ended, if available
endedAt.title: Ended At

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session expires
expiresAt.title: Expires At

keepAlive.description: Indicates if the session remains alive on disconnections
keepAlive.title: Keep Alive

projectId.description: Project ID linked to the session
projectId.title: Project Id

proxyBytes.description: Bytes used via proxy during this session
proxyBytes.title: Proxy Bytes

startedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was started
startedAt.title: Started At

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was last updated
updatedAt.title: Updated At

userMetadata.description: Arbitrary user metadata attached to the session
userMetadata.title: User Metadata

error.description: Error if any occurred during the execution of the action
error.title: Error

successful.description: Whether or not the action execution was successful or not
successful.title: Successful
